name: psychic-gem
effect: Held : When the holder uses a damaging psychic-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging psychic-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text.x_y: A gem with an essence of the mind. When held, it strengthens the power of a Psychic-type move one time.
